name: Turbo Balls
description:
Turbo Balls takes everything that is great about balls and bricks games and gives it a turbo spin.

Game Features:
◉ Free to play
◉ Simple one handed controls
◉ Turbo fast gameplay
◉ Unlock different balls
◉ Challenge your friends with high scores
◉ Find all achievements and secrets
◉ Tablet support

How to Play?
◉ Hold the screen with your finger and move to aim, then release to shoot
◉ Try to break as many bricks as possible before they move down to the bottom 
◉ Collect additional balls to increase your chain of balls

Turbo Balls is suitable for players who love brick breaker games. Casual endless ball bouncing fun with a turbo mode that feels like a cheat.

Download for free today, relax your brain in the addicting brick breaker game!
